long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
What Miraj Clipboard can do:
You can take notes if you suddenly need to take notes while browsing. You can do everything (note save, new note, note delete, note download in txt format, bold, italic, strike, underline, unordered list, ordered list, font size increase, font size decrease, alignment, opportunity to pin urgent notes) while taking notes.
Built with robust security measures to prioritize and protect user data at all times.
